summary.span: 显示用于使用指定列筛选表行的 UI。

span.span: Displays the UI for filtering table rows using a specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [ClassContextClassContext](#ClassContext) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于在页标记中生成用于筛选表行的 UI。The control is used in a page markup to generate the UI for filtering table rows. 动态数据使用 ~\DynamicData\Filters 文件夹中的默认筛选器模板来创建 UI。Dynamic Data creates the UI by using the default filter templates that are in the ~\DynamicData\Filters folder. 这些模板支持外键、 布尔值，并枚举列类型。These templates support foreign-key, Boolean, and enumeration column types. 下表显示了一些可以执行的任务。The following table shows some of the tasks you can perform. |方案Scenario|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |指定要用于表行筛选的列。Specify the column to use for table row filtering.|使用属性指定要用于表行筛选的列。Use the property to specify the column to use for table row filtering.| |指定要用于创建 UI 的筛选器模板的名称。Specify the name of the filter template to use to create the UI.|使用属性来指定要用于创建 UI 的筛选器模板的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the filter template to use to create the UI.| |呈现的 UI 之前执行自定义操作。Perform custom operations before the UI is rendered.|使用之前呈现的 UI 执行自定义操作。Use the to perform custom operations before the UI is rendered.| 可以指定要按以下方式使用的筛选器模板：You can specify the filter template to use in the following ways: - 通过使用页面标记中的属性。By using the property in page markup. 这种方法是表示层自定义，这是独立于架构 （数据库），并且将应用于单个页面。This approach is a presentation-layer customization, which is independent of the schema (database), and which applies to a single page. - 通过使用模型中的属性。By using the attribute in the model. 这种方法是数据层自定义，这取决于特定的架构 （数据库），并且将应用于整个应用程序。This approach is a data-layer customization, which depends on the specific schema (database), and which applies to the entire application. 如果使用这两种方法，标记中指定的筛选器模板优先于在数据模型中指定的模板。If you use both approaches, the filter template that is specified in the markup takes precedence over the template that is specified in the data model. ## 类上下文Class Context 控件用于处理控件。The control is designed to work with the control. 引用控件实例内页面标记中的对象。The control is referenced by a instance inside a object in the page markup. 下图显示了为了实现按外键列进行筛选的表行动态数据执行的步骤。The following figure shows the steps that Dynamic Data follows in order to implement table row filtering by a foreign-key column. ![动态数据查询元素](~/add/media/dynamic-dataquery.png "动态数据查询元素")![Dynamic Data Query Elements](~/add/media/dynamic-dataquery.png "Dynamic Data Query Elements") 1. 控制权将传递到所选的值控件。The control passes the selected value to the control. 2. 控件使用的值来创建查询筛选信息。The control uses the value to create the query filtering information. 然后将此信息传递给数据源控件。It then passes this information to the data source control. 3. 数据源控件将筛选的查询信息传递到数据源提供程序。The data source control passes the filtering query information to the data source provider. 4. 数据源提供程序将查询传递到数据库。The data source provider passes the query to the database. 5. 数据库返回的已筛选的表行。The database returns the filtered table rows. 6. 数据源提供程序将此数据发送回数据源控件。The data source provider sends this data back to the data source control. 7. 数据源控件将传递给数据绑定控件用于显示的已筛选的表行。The data source control passes the filtered table rows to the data-bound control for display. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio 项目的源代码位于此位置：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914)。A Visual Studio project with source code is available at this location: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914). 以下示例使用默认 ForeignKey.ascx 筛选器模板来创建用于 ProductCategory 外键列来筛选产品表行的 UI。The following examples use the default ForeignKey.ascx filter template to create the UI for filtering the Products table rows by the ProductCategory foreign-key column. 当用户选择一个 ProductCategory 值时，仅包含该值的行显示。When the user selects a ProductCategory value, only the rows that contain that value are displayed. 该示例需要以下项：The example requires the following: - 动态数据网站或动态数据 Web 应用程序。A Dynamic Data Web site or a Dynamic Data Web application. 这使您可以创建`AdventureWorksLTDataContext`数据上下文的数据库并创建要访问的表的类。This enables you to create the `AdventureWorksLTDataContext` data context for the database and to create the classes for the tables to access. 有关详情，请参阅`Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`.
